name: Carni-Ball
description:
Welcome to Carni-ball, the hottest game of the underworld! Unbeknownst to mortals, the spirits of the Unspeakable Kingdoms often come together to compete in this ultimate game of possession. Seeking to earn the title of Supreme Spook, these spirits don their favored forms and play to the undeath. Their goal is to be the last left in their chosen vessels after evicting all their opponents: a true testament to their ghostly skill. But this is still very much a spirit’s game—and they aren’t above haunting each other to win…

Tutorial and controls can be found within the game! Just click on the "Tutorial" Button.

Using gamepads are recommended, but keyboard controls work as well.

Game Created by:
Sebastian Bolatto (Cilmering) - Game Designer
Esteban Aldana (El Estebann) - Programmer
Jackson Richmond (Optimalystic) - Sounds & Music
Jonathan Listman (MintJaan) - Artist
Leon-Paul Lynn (Lenl) - Writer
